titles.title: To amend the Atomic Energy Defense Act and the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010 to increase the minor construction threshold, the associated design threshold, and the notification requirement to begin minor construction projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Nuclear Security Enterprise Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2021
This bill increases the minor construction threshold, associated design threshold, and the notification requirement related to national security projects of the Department of Energy.
